Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're leaving?
Well, please come again.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, 
please choose what you want to buy.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right,
please choose 4 flowers from your bag.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, these should be fine.
Give me just a moment and I'll make them
into a bouquet for you.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to the <GREEN>General Store</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You know, <MYNAME>...
I don't think I've ever explained to
you about making bouquets!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>All you have to do is bring me
<RED>4 flowers</RED> and I will arrange them
into a bouquet for you!
<PAGE>
I do charge a small fee for the flower
arranging.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Whenever you give someone a bouquet
as a gift, it shows how you feel about
them and raises their affection for you!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It looks like there's no room in
your bag, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Will you make some space in your
bag so that you can take the a bouquet
with you?
